name: Climb
description: You thought you were the only rock climbing hipster around, but these mountains are full of them. Eliminate all competition and claim your rock! Climb, an online multiplayer brawler with short and action packet game sessions!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: x64 Dual Core CPU, 2+GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 Ti / ATI Radeon HD 7870 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Any Additional Notes: Internet Connection
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: x64 Quad Core CPU, 3+GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 / ATI Radeon HD 7970 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Any Additional Notes: Internet Connection
